programme.desc: With Zara Aurora, Dara vows to be every womens saviour. She wants to confront Mayas father and face her deepest fears but Adam who is concerned for her refuses to perform hypnotherapy on her. Zara has caught everyones interest, including Rizal. However Hibat is catching Dara's heart.

programme.title: Dara Zara - EP 4
programme.desc: Dara tries to get back the money taken by Lan and Li. Zaras effort to help women catches BeModels attention. Rizal who hears the rumour demands that Dara finds Zara for him. Dara finds out that Sufyan and Nadya are researching on Zara Aurora.

programme.title: Dara Zara - EP 5
programme.desc: Adam refuses to help Dara with hypnotherapy fearing for her safety. She begins to ask herself about her fight for womens rights when her presence to help a lady in distress blames her instead for interfering in her private affairs.

programme.title: Dara Zara - EP 6
programme.desc: Dara notices how Hibat treats Zara and her differently. Adam finds out about the real Hibat and feels compelled to confess his feelings to Dara. Sufyan argues with Nadya about her obsession with her research on Zara Aurora. Zaras confrontation this time puts her life in danger.

programme.title: Dara Zara - EP 7

programme.title: Dara Zara - EP 8

For the first time, Zara is not the one doing the saving but is being saved. Dara's deteriorating health is beyond anyone's control.

programme.desc: An attendee of an angel seminar has been found beaten to death. The case becomes personal for Sievers when suspicions fall on fellow participant Hanne Wegener whom he knows from his past. Feldmann has no choice but to conduct the investigation undercover.

programme.desc: Teppo, the leader of a gang of neo-nazis, falls in love with Sari. To his shock, Sari’s son is black, and Teppo finds his prejudices and loyalties pitted against his desire for love and family.

programme.title: Timeline
programme.desc: A romantic reunion turns into a life-or-death game of secrets and survival, where the past cannot stay hidden.

programme.title: Thank You For Coming
programme.desc: After coming to the realization that time is not on his side, a small-time actor who currently works as a restaurant waiter, must try anything and everything to fulfil his dream of starring in a feature film.
